dialogues.text: He reaches out to close it...and then JOLTS as a HAND rea out from within it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He FLAILS backwards in fright, watching as the hand wrenc a mop of hair into view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FULL GROWN BODY BEGINS TO CLAW its way out of the drawe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drawers in Dalton's room slide open in unison. Then cabin The closet BURSTS open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pale adult bodies begin to claw their way out of the different doors, undulating out of impossibly small space and falling onto the floor like limbless insects.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cracks are opening in our world and the miserable dead ar slithering through the fissures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More doors shoot open - cabinets, closets, the pantry. Fo by unseen hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More hideous forms wrench themselves out into our world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh is exhausted, pushing himself to the limits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hears the voice again - distant and small. An echo.

dialogues.speaker: RENAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Find us...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh follows the voice to a door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He staggers towards it, still supporting Dalton. He slams door open, falling through it into--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- the empty basement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is in the basement of his old house. The wooden steps beckon above him. 97.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai's voice cries out from behind the door at the top o the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: RENAI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Hurry! Come back to us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put me down, I can run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh sets Dalton down, who scampers up the stairs. Josh i about to follow when he turns and spies a familiar face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leers at Josh through the window of the basement, her visage spookily flecked in candlelight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh is transfixed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, dad! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! I'm right behind you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dalton charges ahead as Josh glares back at this face fro his past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You...what do you want from me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old woman's eerily unblinking gaze cuts through Josh. long dormant rage BOILS OVER inside him. He approaches th window, vomiting fury at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the fuck away from me! I'm not scared of you, just leave me alone! Get away from me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old woman's lips protract to unveil a yellow graveyar molars. A smile to buckle the steeliest nerve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She raises a lit candle to her lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She snuffs out the plume with a single puff...plunging th basement into darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Specs staggers back as the skeletal figures emerging from cabinets ambulate into the living room, surrounding Josh. 98.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check on the boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Specs sprints out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are now locked into a POV shot, pushing down the corri of the Lambert's NEW HOUSE. The scene of the trance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our POV is bee-lining for Dalton's bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In another POV shot, we SURGE up the basement stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our POV is only a few yards from Dalton's bedroom door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Red-Faced Man appears at the opposite end of the hall Malevolent. Cruel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He SCREAMS and flits towards us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The POV keeps going, hitting the bedroom door and FLINGIN OPEN - seeing DALTON'S BODY sleeping inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We SOAR towards it, getting closer--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Specs stands over Dalton's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUDDENLY - Dalton shudders, his legs spasm. His eyes FLIC open and he SUCKS IN A HUGE BREATH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's awake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dalton sits up, panting. Renai charges into the room. He looks at her, registering her appearance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai literally throws herself at him, wrapping her arms around his body. No words can express.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai scoops him up, carrying him out of the bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The second POV whooshes down the corridor, zeroing in on living room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A scene of desperation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise leans into Josh's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The living room is now filled with the CREEPING FORMS of souls who crawled out from within the drawers. All of the marching towards Josh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find me, Josh! Now! Wake up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The closest entity reaches out with gnarled fingers and i almost touching Josh--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The POV shoots towards Josh's body, seconds away--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh's eyes BURST OPEN and he inhales a chest full of air if emerging from deep water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He falls forward, his strength gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh? Josh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pants on the floor, barely able to speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dalton...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dalton and Renai pounce on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh holds onto Dalton like he's a life preserver, and in way, for Josh, he is. He laughs, inhaling deeply. 100.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Specs, Elise and Tucker approach. Renai sees them and sta up, tearful. She is lost for words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what to say...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She rushes forward and hugs all three of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well put.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh brings Lorraine in they all embrace in a circle. A g hug for the ages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now this is worth dying for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Specs and Tucker haul a large tripod case to their van, heaving it into the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stand in awkward silence. It's been a long day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess you did some pretty awesome stuff in there. You deserve some credit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did good too in an assistant- type way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tucker can't hold his stoic pose any longer. He breaks ou laughing, followed quickly by Specs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, I got some amazing shots. We are gonna write a book and my shots are gonna be the main selling point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the main selling point, but definitely important, for sure. 101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai lie with Dalton on her bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm tired.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too bad. I'm never letting you go to sleep again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She runs her fingers through his hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you know we'd come and find you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dalton nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whenever you're lost...we'll always come and find you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh wanders out of the kitchen, examining the house as i seeing it for the first time. He is smiling...happier tha have ever seen him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise sits on the couch amongst the remains of Tucker's paraphernalia of the paranormal. Josh approaches her, standing over her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You introduced me to a new world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You've been there before, remember? And you'll go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of us will...eventually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe I can forget again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches into his jacket, taking out the eerie photos Lorraine gave him of himself as a child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll start by giving these back. 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he hands them to Elise, she sees with fear that his ha is withered and wrinkled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like the hand of an eighty year old woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shocked, she looks up at his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise stands. She looks haunted. Her eyes wide and unnerv

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing, I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns away, reaching for something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter, Elise?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spins around and lifts Tucker's camera up to her face aiming it at him. She depresses the trigger and takes a p of him, bathing the whole corridor in white light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh recoils back in shock. Elise lowers the camera. She terrified. Josh suddenly LUNGES at her, slapping the came out of her hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the fuck would you do that? Why would you do that? Why?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He SLAMS her against the wall, his hands around her throa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise chokes in terror, terrified of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You of all people! You know! Why would you do that to me when you know what you know? You bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He abruptly stops attacking her, staggering backwards, examining his hands as if he can't believe what he's done Seething with fury. Panting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise collapses, catching her breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh swipes a framed photo off the wall and storms away, heading down the corridor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...swallowed up by the darkness. 103.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai furrows her brow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that? (beat; to Dalton) Stay here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai jogs into the living room. Sees Elise lying on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise, what was that noise?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise simply looks up at her. The utter terror on her fac palpable. Her neck is bleeding from scratch marks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus...what happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise just stares, unable to speak. Her fear is contagiou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Josh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh? Josh?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and runs into the corridor, flicking on the lig

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is nobody there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai dashes from room to room in the hallway, pitching e door open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Each room is empty. Josh is nowhere to be found.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise stares at Tucker's camera in a state of catatonic d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Renai backs into the room, her own fear rising in her gut She leans down and grabs Elise by the shoulders. 104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise, what happened? You're scaring me, tell me where Josh is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise finally looks up at her. Seeing the "expert" so afr unnerves Renai. When the lion-tamer drops his whip and ru you know the lion is vicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise opens her mouth to speak...but nothing comes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instead, she simply holds up the camera, showing Renai th digital display of the photo she took.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We do not see it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We simply see the look of horror on Renai's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have returned to the previous scene - only now we are seeing it through Elise's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise is sitting on the couch, alone. Trying to recover f the nights events.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She glances up when Josh approaches her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You introduced me to a new world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You've been there before, remember? And you'll go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of us will...eventually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe I can forget again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once again, we see him reach into his jacket, taking out photos Lorraine gave him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll start by giving these back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he hands them to Elise, she sees with fear that his ha is withered and wrinkled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shocked, she looks up at his face. 105.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise stands up, not knowing how to react.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing, I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns away, reaching for something. We see her scoop Tucker's digital camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter, Elise?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spins around and lifts Tucker's camera up to her face aiming it at him. She depresses the trigger and takes a p of him, bathing the whole corridor in white light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --and in that split second, Josh is replaced by the Old Woman!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise lowers the camera, horrified. For a beat, the Old W just glares at her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...then she CHARGES at Elise, arms outstretched, wrapping white hands around the soft flesh of Elise's throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elise CHOKES, eyes bulging, spittle flying from her mouth the pale hands of the Old Woman dig into her thorax, drop of blood running down her chest where the yellowing finge nails have CUT IN to the flesh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Old Woman smiles - a merciless harlequin grin that mo Elise's pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She lets Elise go, letting her drop to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Old Woman turns and glares down the corridor. Somethi has caught her attention. A distant scream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door groans open, a blade of light penetrating pitch black darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The silhouette of the Old Woman floats ethereally into th bathroom. She steps up to the mirror, then reaches into h tattered Victorian dress and produces a candle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She lights the candle with a match, holding it beneath he chin and glaring into the reflective surface of the mirro 106.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instead of seeing her own reflection though, she sees THR the mirror as if it were a window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In it, she can see the BASEMENT of the Lambert's previous residence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh bursts into the basement, carrying Dalton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put me down, I can run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh sets Dalton down, who scampers up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are watching the same scene we saw earlier play out in mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh is about to follow when he turns and spies a familia face. He looks at the Old Woman...seeing her through the `window'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, dad! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! I'm right behind you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dalton disappears as Josh glares at the woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You...what do you want from me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He approaches the mirror. WE CIRCLE AROUND the Old Woman, past the mirror and THROUGH THE BATHROOM WALL, emerging o the other side in--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --the basement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Josh screams at the Old Woman as she stares at him throug what he thinks is a window. THEY HAVE SWAPPED PLACES. He now in The Further, and she is in our world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get away the fuck away from me. I'm not scared of you, just leave me alone! Get away from me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We KEEP CIRCLING, wiping past Josh's back and completing 360 degree turn, THROUGH THE WALL and back into-- 107.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --our world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Old Woman smiles at Josh's rage. She finds it amusing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With an eerily unblinking gaze, she snuffs out the plume flame with a single puff of breath...plunging the bathroo into darkness...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and snuffing out Josh forever...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and ever.
